code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from"react";import axios updatedData=data.map(item=>item._id===itemId?{...item,date:value}:item);setData(updatedData);axios.put(`${apiUrl}/api/data/${itemId}`,{...updatedData.find(item=>item._id===itemId),date:value,updatedBy:username}).catch(error=>console.error("Error
